titles.title: HP319 Lord, give us your Spirit, Where children cry

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Where children cry, let us wipe their tears away;
And where children fall, let us lift them to their feet:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Where there is pain, let us be your healing hands;
And where there is grief, let us comfort with your love:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Where people hate, let us dwell among them with love;
And where people fight, let us bind their deepest wounds:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord, give us your Spirit, your Spirit that is love.
Lord, fill us with your life, freely given for the world.
